summary: Project is being prepared for a live deployment of the current app draft (Version 33).

existing_features.title: Deploy the current codebase (Version 33) to production on the Internet Computer, upgrading both the backend canister and the frontend asset canister using the existing single-actor backend architecture.

Run a production smoke test after deployment covering: landing page render, offer-page navigation, contact form submission path (including reCAPTCHA readiness handling), and admin-only backend queries remaining protected by access control.

Verify production configuration needed for the deployed version is in place (e.g., reCAPTCHA settings expected by the frontend and backend), and document any required post-deploy admin steps (such as setting the reCAPTCHA secret via the existing admin method) to make the live contact form fully operational.

new_feature_requests.summary: Deploy the current app draft (Version 33) live / to production
